params.asset: The address of the underlying asset
The address of the underlying asset
The address of the underlying asset to supply
params.onBehalfOf: The address that will receive the aTokens
params.referralCode: Code used to register the integrator originating the operation

params.amount: The amount to be withdrawn (use type(uint256).max for full balance)
params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to withdraw
params.to: The address that will receive the underlying asset

getReserveData(address).notice: Get reserve data for a specific asset

getReserveNormalizedIncome(address).notice: Get normalized income for a reserve

getUserAccountData(address).notice: Get user account data across all reserves
